segments.text: I'm about to run out of business cards . I need some new ones .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can print as many as you like . Just tell me how many .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two thousand should get me through the year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's a form to get you started .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My old card is perfect , so all I want you to do is copy it exactly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you'll be very pleased with how well we duplicate your old card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Come back here next Wednesday to pick up your order , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but can you give me a three-day turnaround ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you don't mind paying a little extra , it's absolutely no problem .
segments.speaker: S2
